name: Battery Samurai
description:
Battery Samurai

The samurai was banished to another world after losing most of your energy source (AA batteries) and parts.
Battery Samurai is an adventure game where you explore across the map to collect batteries and parts scattered.

Attacks and other actions consume energy.
Of course, you also lose a lot of energy when you get hit.
You'll need to properly distribute your chances to attack, dash, etc.

Explore the map, get stronger, and defeat the boss!
